snippet: Mr. Wallace was one of the first reporters assigned to write about broader issues affecting both the National and American Football Leagues.
abstract: William N Wallace, former sports reporter for The New York Times, dies at age 88.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Wallace was one of the first reporters assigned to write about broader issues affecting both the National and American Football Leagues.

headline.seo: William N. Wallace, Ex-New York Times Sports Reporter, Dies at 88
headline.main: William N. Wallace, Former Times Reporter, Dies at 88
headline.print_headline: William N. Wallace, 88, Former Times Reporter
